LanguageData.MakeRoastwMushrooms.label: 烹制蘑菇肉汤
LanguageData.MakeRoastwMushrooms.description: Prepare a roast with seared mushrooms on top. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.MakeRoastwMushrooms_Bulk.label: 烹制蘑菇肉汤 (x4)
LanguageData.MakeRoastwMushrooms_Bulk.description: Prepare a couple of pots and throw in a roast and a couple of mushrooms in each one and wait ... Bam! Pot roast and mushrooms. \n\n产出：4.
LanguageData.MakeStewMushrooms.label: 烹制炖蘑菇

LanguageData.MakeStewMushrooms_Bulk.description: Prepares hearty stews of mushrooms. \n\n产出：4.
